title: Study Plan
content: The Master of Safety and Risk Engineering program is designed to produce skilled professionals in analyzing, designing, and implementing safety systems and risk management in the transportation and related industries. With a multidisciplinary approach, the program integrates safety theory, advanced technology, and data-driven risk management practices to create innovative solutions. Graduates are prepared to tackle modern safety challenges, including operational risk mitigation and sustainable policy development. Through intensive learning, applied research, and guidance from experts, graduates have career opportunities in government, transportation companies, and international organizations focused on safety and sustainability.
